title: more options...
comment: SidePanel (beta)functions as expected, but it seems slow to activate at times and I believe more customization options would be beneficial; panel width, icon size, always available icons for commonly used apps, etc.

title: Great concept but poor functionality
comment: The concept of the app is great but unfortunately doesn't work on 4.2 galaxy nexus, continuous force closes! Should be more customised, ability to add applications to the panel. Unfortunately doesn't work, uninstalled till it gets improvised

title: Not working
comment: I can't get the SidePanel to open to save my life. I am familiar with the gesture and use it daily for Swapps, PIE, and the PIE controls in the browser.  I love that it is open source, and I like that all the features are available for free. But I can't use it since it refuses to work for me.

title: really good app
comment: thanks a lot for the great effort please consider these in next versions: 1. ignore list 2. smoother animation 3. and if it's possible: full swipe =previous app mini swipe=your default function(side bar)

title: Open source!
comment: Needs some work, but it's coming along. Is it possible to add a screen bottom toggle? That's the one thing I'd want from all of these app switchers.

title: Open source!
comment: Love the concept, but the actual idea needs a bit of work. Keep it up though, you have my full attention and support.

title: Good
